forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The air over Downtown San Francisco carries a gentle warmth, baked under a mostly sunny sky that inspires a soft contentment. Despite the high reaching into the mid-sixties, a cool breeze continues to weave through the streets, whispering reminders of the Pacific’s embrace just beyond the city. As the afternoon unfolds, expect the temperatures to hover around a comfortable 62, with a west-southwest wind nudging at 10 to 14 mph, promising to keep the air feeling fresh. 

Tonight, the evening clouds will thicken, cloaking the city in a veil of gray, and there’s a slight chance of drizzle as the hours inch toward dawn. The low will settle around 56, creating an atmosphere perfect for cozy layers. As you step out today, a light jacket or sweater will serve well against the chill of the approaching night. The subtle art of San Francisco weather invites one to stroll along the Embarcadero or sip coffee at a sidewalk café, as the world around transitions into a quieter evening filled with the soft murmur of the city life.
